name: ertr2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))

stmt.origin: ertrd(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, w0)
stmt.pretty: ertrd(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c4, c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c4, c1, c0))

comment: A transitivity relation for equivalences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
